page.title: 17EMPLOYERS IN HAUGHTON AREA
page.content: Two halls situated in the area employ both full and part-time staff in a domestic capacity and to maintain their grounds. Local youths are also employed doing odd jobs and gardening. Our local services such as the Smithy and Post Office afford family employment with some part-time staff to help. Local horse owners employ the youth of the area casuallyto ride out and groom their mounts. Last,but no means least, is our local hostelry, which employs local residents domestically and as bar staff and also serves as the workers meeting place where gossip is exchanged. Generally speaking, our small rural community is quite fortunate in it's employment prospects embracing all age ranges and abilities.
